remarks: For any neighborhood ` N ` of ` S ` , there is a neighborhood ` x ` of ` S ` such that ` N ` is a neighborhood of all subsets of ` x ` . Proposition Viv of [BourbakiTop1] p.  I.3 .  (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)
